Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/State
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rrted EB: 69th,Lafayette, 71st, King Dr, & 69th; WB: 69th, King Dr, 71st, State, 69th, & Red Line due to, street blockage nr 69th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 69th/State.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, Lafayette, 71st, King Drive, and 69th.

Westbound buses will operate via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State, 69th, and the Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 69th/State
ShortDescription: Northbound 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State, 69th, and the Red Line due to, street blockage near 69th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State, 69th, and the Red Line due to, street blockage near 69th/State.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
